articles.description: Swiss cyclist Muriel Furrer dies after suffering a serious head injury at the Road and Para-cycling World Championships in Switzerland.

articles.description: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola says he's been provoked into a more intense rivalry with Arsenal as the fallout continues from their Premier League clash at Etihad Stadium last weekend.
articles.title: Pep Guardiola: Man City boss says he's been provoked into bigger Arsenal rivalry
